did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Retail, Wholesale and Department Store Union (RWDSU)
Local 1199 Drug and Hospital Employees Union

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: New York Times obituary for Jesse Olson, January 26, 2009.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Jesse Olson was born in 1924 in New York City. He was former vice presdient of 1199 SEIU United Healthcare Workers East. He joined the staff of the union in 1959 and retired in 1984. He passed away in 2009.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an obituary for Jesse Olson, printed out from the New York Times website. The obituary was published on January 26, 2009.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: National Union of Hospital and Nursing Home Employees. Local 1199 Drug & Hospital Union (New York, N.Y.)
Retail, Wholesale, and Department Store Union.
Retail, Wholesale, and Department Store Union. Local 1199 Drug and Hospital Employees Union (New York, N.Y.)
Service Employees International Union. District 1199 (Rochester, N.Y.)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Local 1199 Biography files #6281m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: From the New York Times, January 26, 2009.
